column2: Although the people of Faer没n honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Although the people of Faer没n honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Yondalla, goddess of protection and halflings.
Sheela Peryryol, goddess of agriculture and love.
Urogalan, god of death and earth.
Although the people of Faer没n honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Arvoreen, god of defense and vigilance.
Brandobaris, god of curiosity and thievery.
Cyrrollalee, goddess of friendship and hospitality.
Although the people of Faer没n honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Tymora, goddess of luck and fortune.
